get.summary: Lists operations for the resource provider.
get.description: Lists all the supported operations by the Microsoft.DevSpaces resource provider along with their description.

operation.description: Name of the resource provider operation.

description.description: Description of the resource provider operation.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next page for list of Azure operations.

get.summary: Gets an Azure Dev Spaces Controller.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource group to which the resource belongs.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

location.description: Region where the Azure resource is located.

hostSuffix.description: DNS suffix for public endpoints running in the Azure Dev Spaces Controller.

targetContainerHostResourceId.description: Resource ID of the target container host

targetContainerHostCredentialsBase64.description: Credentials of the target container host (base64).

tier.description: The tier of the SKU for Azure Dev Spaces Controller.
